speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0162/2006 ) by Mr Rosati, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on public finances in the EMU ( 2005/2166(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0162/2006 ) by Mr Rosati, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on public finances in the EMU ( 2005/2166(INI) ).
